sentences.en: English, Maths, ICT and science are compulsory subjects.
sentences.cn: 英语、数学、信息与通信技术和科学是必修科目。

sentences.en: He got a goose egg on his maths test.
He is absorbed in the calculation of that difficult maths problem.
sentences.cn: 他全神贯注地在算那道数学难题.

sentences.en: He is now reading for a maths degree at Surrey University.
sentences.cn: 他现在就读于萨里大学，攻读数学学位。
他教科学和数学这两门课。

sentences.en: How did you do in the maths test [ quiz ] ?
sentences.cn: 你的数学 考 得 怎么样 ?

sentences.en: I got left behind at school with the maths.
sentences.cn: 在校时我的数学跟不上。

sentences.en: I was never any good at maths.
Mr Palmer was a retired maths master.
sentences.cn: 帕尔默先生是一名退休的数学教师。

sentences.en: Our teacher gave us a lot of helpful books in maths.
sentences.cn: 我们老师给了我们许多数学上有帮助的书.

sentences.en: Schools are piloting the new maths course.
sentences.cn: 学校正试用新的数学教程.

sentences.en: She got top marks in maths and chemistry.
sentences.cn: 她数学和化学得了最高分。

sentences.en: the core subjects of English, Maths and Science
sentences.cn: 英语、数学和自然科学这些核心科目

sentences.en: The papers in maths and English are very testing.
sentences.cn: 数学试卷和英语试卷很难。

sentences.en: The school will give priority to science, maths and modern languages.
sentences.cn: 学校将重点发展理科、数学和现代语言。

sentences.en: You can make capital of your knowledge of maths.
sentences.cn: 你可以利用你的数学知识.

words.tran_cn: 数学的，数学上的；精确的
